titleStmt.title: Letter from Harry R. Haynie to John G. Neihardt, December 2, 1968
titleStmt.author: Haynie, Harry R.

publicationStmt.authority: The Papers of John G. Neihardt

bibl.title: Letter from Harry R. Haynie to John G. Neihardt, December 2, 1968

div1.fw: UNIVERSITY OF NEBRASKA FOUNDATION SUITE 220, NEBRASKA UNION BUILDING LINCOLN, NEBRASKA 68508 (402) 472-2151
div1.p: We're approaching the Centennial Celebration of the University of Nebraska. The exact date of her 100th birth-day is February 15, 1969.

We want it to be a great year...worthy of a GREAT University. We hope that the NU Foundation will be able to do more for the University and its students and faculty than ever before. But this depends upon the 1968 gifts form her active alumni.
That's why we're sending you this SPECIAL letter.
We consider you among the 20 per cent of the alumni who are truly active adn have shown a concern.
As yet, we haven't heard from you in 1968, AND WE WANT YOUR NAME ON THE 1968 ROLL OF DONORS, published in the Centennial Year.
Why? Because the only true way the world can judge a University is by the caliber of its No. 1 product--its Alumni.
NU may be an Old Lady in age...but she's still filled with enthusiasm and vigor, and she has a bright outlook on the future. And she'll measure her Alumni with the best of them.
I hope you're as proud of her as she is of you.

closer.note: Harry R. Haynie President P.S. Won't you send your 1968 gift today? A postage-paid envelope is enclosed for your convenience. HRH/wd

div1.p: We want your name Mr. Neihardt in the NU Foundation's Roll of Donors
This is a partial replica of last year's Roll of Donors, listing names of active alumni who contributed to the University of Nebraska Foundation.
In the Centennial Year -1969- the Foundation will publish the names of those alumni who contributed in 1968.
div1.note: List of names of donors to NU Foundation as background and not transcribed
div1.p: The only true way to judge a University is by...
div1.note: List of names of donors to NU Foundation as background and not transcribed

div1.p: The University of Nebraska Foundation 220 Nebraska Union, Lincoln, Nebraska 68505 I/we give $___ as my/our investment in work of the University of Nebraska Foundation for the current year.
No administrative costs come out of your donation.
Please make your check payable to the Univeristy of Nebraska Foundation. Fold this and return with your gift.
Please send a reminder next year. Date___
Please send information about wills, bequests and life income giving for benefit of the University of Nebraska.
